title: Welsh Government International 󠁧󠁢󠁷󠁬󠁳 (@walesintheworld) / Twitter
body: Plastic pollution causes harm to our natural environment. That's why we're taking climate action by banning several single-use plastic items from October as a part of the #EnvironmentalProtectionBill Let's preserve our planet for future generations #WorldEnvironmentDay. 1:05.
